soen6441.team01.warzone.model

Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • soen6441.team01.warzone.model.Player
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IPlayerModel

    public class Player
extends java.lang.Object
implements IPlayerModel
    The class Player provides the implementation of a Warzone human player

        public Player(java.lang.String p_name,
              SoftwareFactoryModel p_factory_model)
       throws java.lang.Exception
        Constructor for class Player. Don't use issue_order if using this constructor as there is no way to get an order without specifying IGameplayOrderDatasource.
        Parameters:
        p_name - the name of player
        p_factory_model - the model factory to use when needed
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - general exceptions

      • copyOrders

        public void copyOrders(IPlayerModel p_cloned_player)
                throws java.lang.Exception
        copies the orders from the speicifed player. used mainly when copying the orders from cloned players used during the issue_orders() phase. Note: the specified player must have the same name as this player.
        Specified by:
        copyOrders in interface IPlayerModel
        Parameters:
        p_cloned_player - the player to get the orders to copy from.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - unexpected error

                               int p_number_of_armies)
                        throws java.lang.Exception
        add the specified armies (reinforcements) to the specified owned country.
        Specified by:
        deploy in interface IPlayerModel
        Parameters:
        p_country_name - the name of the country to deploy to
        p_number_of_armies - the number of reinforcement armies to move to the specified country
        Returns:
        a message that describes the deployment done
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if country is not owned, or not enough reinforcements, or unexpected error

        Parameters:
